Name: The Far Kingdoms:  Magic Mosaics
About the game: 'The Far Kingdoms: Magic Mosaics' takes you on a challenging mosaic puzzle journey where you gather magic elements. These magic elements are refills for 4 mystical runes. These runes are the pillar of protection from the invasion of the evil dark magician that threatens the kingdom. - 80 levels of multi-color mosaics - Refill 4 magic elements - Travel to 4 different kingdoms
